name: I Can't See Me
description:
I Can’t See Me is an online platform game you will have to solve environment puzzles but without seeing what you’re actually doing and rely only on the description of the other player that will be able to see.

You're locked in a tower and every floor has one level.

There will be different types of puzzles like riddles, codes to enter or physical puzzles like mechanisms to activate to open a door and escape.
